metadata.title: District Control Room established to enhance the Capitalâ€™s security

content.article_body: ISLAMABAD, May 08 (APP):The office of the District Magistrate has announced the establishment of a round-the-clock District Control Room to enhance security measures in the Islamabad Capital Territory. The notification, issued by the Additional District Magistrate here Thursday, highlights the move as a response to the current security situation in the country. Located at the Safe City Project Building in Police Lines, Sector H-11, the new control room aims to provide immediate response and coordination during emergencies. Three dedicated helpline numbers 051-9001521, 051-9001581 and 051-9001584 have been set up to assist residents. Residents are encouraged to use these helpline numbers for any security-related concerns or emergencies.
